_Disable_Optimizations_Options.ROTATION: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to vertex rotation caching (ParticleManagerRotationMixin, BillboardParticleMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.CULLING: [Impact: High] Disables mixins related to particle culling (FrustumAccessor, ParticleAccessor, ParticleManagerFrustumMixin, WorldRendererFrustumMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.TYPE: [Impact: Low to Medium] Disables mixins related to particle disabling and reduction (WorldRendererTypeMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.DECREASE: [Impact: Low] Disables mixins related particle settings reduction (ALL, DECREASED, MINIMAL) (WorldRendererDecreaseMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.LIGHTMAP: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to light map caching (ParticleManagerCachedLightMixin, ParticleMixin)
_Disable_Optimizations_Options.POTION: [Impact: Low] Disables mixins related to potion particle disabling (LivingEntityMixin)
